item.title: About
item.description:
Hi — I’m David León, 21 years old 🇻🇪. I’m passionate about information security: a CTF player, security researcher and future SOC Analyst. I enjoy solving challenges, automating tasks with Python and learning something new every day. 💡

  • Age: 21 🧑‍💻
  • Nationality: Venezuelan 🇻🇪
  • Roles: CTF player 🏆 · Security researcher 🔎 · Future SOC Analyst 🛡️
  • Skills: Pentesting, vulnerability analysis, Python scripting 🐍, networking and Linux 🐧
  • Mindset: Curious, persistent and collaborative — always learning.

Interested in collaborating, proposing a challenge or reading a write-up? I’m open to projects and to sharing knowledge. Find me on the site’s social links or leave a message. ✉️

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: Contact
item.description:
Hi! 👋 I’m David León — if you want to contact me to collaborate, propose a challenge, ask for help, or just say hi, here are the fastest ways to reach me:

  • ✉️ Email: boydeveloper00@gmail.com
  • 💬 Telegram: @x00_Daveey
  • 🧩 TryHackMe: tryhackme.com/p/0xDaveey
  • 💻 GitHub: github.com/justgr0w

What can you expect?

  • Response within 1–3 business days (if urgent, please indicate “URGENT” in the subject line). ⏳
  • Collaborations on CTFs, write-ups, security projects, and automation with Python are welcome. 🤝
  • If you prefer, please leave a clear message with your proposal and relevant links (repo, challenge, brief).

Privacy
